des: "Was looking for some new salad dressing that has spunk but unusual enough that you won't find in any store. This definitely meets the need and also goes great with most any meat or fish: tuna, salmon, chicken, shrimp, beef, etc. This stores well in the fridge."
ins: Whisk rice wine vinegar, honey, soy sauce, wasabi paste, sesame oil, lime juice, and ginger together in a bowl to make dressing.
